title: Instructional Design Utilizing SNT to Enhance Participation in Learning Communities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge in science fields and experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: An intensive short-term science course emphasizing collaborative interaction among learners. Iterative design is applied to continuously improve SNT (Social Network Text) by incorporating learner feedback.

learning_goals: Learners achieve ≥85% cognitive understanding of environmental psychology concepts through photo-sharing activities using SNT
Enhance emotional engagement within the learning community by ≥20% through SNT-based discussion participation ≥3 times weekly
Generate ≥5 actionable improvement proposals for SNT functionality by analyzing feedback survey and interview data
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
